title: Mastro123
author: Mastro123
content: Hey guysI‘m new in this forum and hope for your help. Until now I bought all my cryptos on exchanges.Now I found the LunaOne on presale https://cde.lunaone.com/invite?ref=UD39701I think it could be a huge thing in the metaverse. What do you think about it? Next Mana/Sand or just a bad oportunity? I don‘t know if I should buy moreThanks for your feedbacks
